website_summaries.verdict: Lightweight, durable vacuum with good cleaning power that works on multiple surfaces.
pros: Most users can maneuver this 10.6-pound vacuum, and the 700W motor is powerful enough to handle routine household cleaning
Roller works well on pet hair
Attachments include dust brush and upholstery tool
Adjustable height for carpet or hardwood
Technology designed to prevent blockages and other wear
cons: This lightweight vacuum has a tendency to tip over when attachments are in use

customer_reviews.title: Best Little Sucker Ever!
customer_reviews.text: The Best Sucking little vacuum ever!! Light weight, great pick-up and superb for the kitchen. This fits perfectly under the edge of the kitchen base cabinets and won't scuff or scratch my new cabinetry. I've had many vacuums but this little shark is amongst the best I've ever had. Big expensive vacuums wouldn't lift sock lint from my weaved pattern carpet, no problem with my new Shark. The dirt canister isn't very large so emptying every other time may be needed. It also doesn't have a retractable cord but no problem for me. The cord is nice and long too.
customer_reviews.author: Caroll

customer_reviews.title: I was amazed and shocked by how much dirt and pet hair ...
customer_reviews.text: I used my Shark Navigator for the first time tonight. I was amazed and shocked by how much dirt and pet hair it picked up from my carpets. I clean houses and my customers that have Sharks love them. I also volunteer at a cat adoption center with carpet. The Shark we use there has been used twice a day everyday vacuuming up cat hair and litter for over a year now and it is still going strong. I choose this model because it is lightweight as I am used to using an 8lb. Oreck and wanted something close to that weight. I would highly recommend this vacuum.
customer_reviews.author: barb1533

customer_reviews.title: JUNK
customer_reviews.text: I hate this vacuum. It really is just junk and is lousy on any rugs. Works OK on hardwood. Last night I had a random big beetle in the house, and this would not even pick it up. I wish I had saved the boxes, and sadly, I'll have to get something else. I wanted to try something other than Hoover, but in my experience, they really are the best. Looks like this $100 will go right to the thrift store in the way of a donation. GET SOMETHING ELSE!
customer_reviews.author: Mook Hayes

customer_reviews.title: Lasted less than 2 hours
customer_reviews.text: Well this vacuum started off great. I vacuumed one whole room of my house. When I unplugged it and moved it to a new room it would no longer turn on. Tried in multiple outlets in my house, even the one it was originally in, checked for obstructions, nothing. Seems that the power switch broke. After an hour-2 of use. Don’t waste your money.
customer_reviews.author: Nicole Drummond

customer_reviews.title: this little pup really sucks..
customer_reviews.text: this little pup really sucks....pardon the pun. It's light weight and does pull itself along. I was shocked after first time using it how much dirt it got out of the carpet. My only concern is the brush is not adjustable for carpet and worry it will possibly wear the carpet down faster. don't let the small size of the head fool you, I rather enjoyed it gets into places easier that any other I have used. For the price, this little guy does better than the high end vacumes. would have given it five star but the non adjustable head could be a problem.
customer_reviews.author: dianejmac

customer_reviews.title: Dead in 3 years
customer_reviews.text: Was so great! For 3 years. Then lost all suction and saw that hose had split, in like 5 places.
customer_reviews.author: Karin

customer_reviews.title: Broke after 4 months.
customer_reviews.text: So I love the Sharks for their easy disposal, easy changing from brush to hand held, so I was stoked to find one one the less expensive side. Omg, what a let down. 1- terrible at pet hair removal from deep carpet, 2- suction power was crap, 3- the damn hose connecting the handheld to the base unit was too short, and 4- the damn thing broke at a plastic link between the hose and the base unit, rendering it useless. Had it 4 months.
customer_reviews.author: Kera Elder

customer_reviews.title: Lightweight and powerful suction
customer_reviews.text: This vacuum is very lightweight and picks up on hard floors as well as it does on carpet, (as long as you turn the brush roll off on hard floors). I clean houses for a living and am very impressed how well this little vacuum works! I love it and recommend to anyone. It also reaches in smaller areas due to its size. The motor pulls the vacuum for you when the brush is on and you wouldn't ask for a more powerful suction. It even picks up sand and leaves. Comes with several attachments and so easy to carry. So happy to have it.
customer_reviews.author: karey

customer_reviews.title: Awesome suction until there is none!  POOR Customer Service
customer_reviews.text: This vacuum has great suction, even though it's rather difficult to push across medium pile carpet. I still felt like it was a great value until about 7 months in, it stopped picking up altogether. Long story short, the replacement process under warranty was awful. I had to go spend hours on numerous phone calls (no joke), had to go several weeks without a replacement, jump through all kinds of hoops, not to mention package & pay for the return shipping of the used unit. Totally not worth all of the hassle. Shame that Shark customer service is lacking SO badly.
customer_reviews.author: Michael Bonnell

customer_reviews.title: It's a Super Duper Picker Upper
customer_reviews.text: Due to serious back pain I HAD to find a light-weight vacuum. I read alot of reviews to find one and in all honesty the Shark didn't catch my attention but the price did. Vacuums are expensive !! I got it in the mail and had to attach the handle and hose, no biggie. I didn't even need any tools !! I'm not handy so that was a big plus !! Used it the first time and was SUPER surprised at the pick up. My puppy didn't like it but I sure as hell did !! So super happy I bought this one.
customer_reviews.author: robsmith70

customer_reviews.title: Graet
customer_reviews.text: I didn't think that I could ever love a vacuum cleaner, but I love this vacuum cleaner. It has so much power and it is so light weight. It works as well as more expensive vacuum cleaners that I have had previously. If you're vacuuming the whole house you probably need to empty out the dirt two or three times. If someone is looking for a lightweight very powerful vacuum cleaner this is it
customer_reviews.author: Kelly O

customer_reviews.title: smells like its burning up
customer_reviews.text: smells like its burning up, makes a noise like it is dying when the brush roller is on. the light for it doesnt work. Ive only used it 3 times
customer_reviews.author: AI

customer_reviews.title: You DO NOT get the brush in the advertisement.!!
customer_reviews.text: Bought this vacuum to replace the shark I had for 10 yrs. Liked the brush attachment that is shown in the advertisement picture.. I instead received the attachment with red lint catcher fibers!!! How is that supposed to help get pet hair off my carpeted stairs?? The ONLY reason I bought this is for my carpeted stairs which are the ONLY carpeted surfaces in my home.
customer_reviews.author: Maniac mom

customer_reviews.title: Somewhat dissapointed!
customer_reviews.text: This is a nice light weight sweeper and appears to work well on the average carpet; however, our carpet seems to be soft, and this sweeper sinks down into the carpet making it very hard to push & pull. When I ordered it I thought that I read that it had a height adjustment but it does not, one can turn the brush off for bare floors and that is it. It does appear to have good suction. The 9 inch width is handy but requires many strokes in a large room.
customer_reviews.author: H. B. De

customer_reviews.title: I Love It!
customer_reviews.text: I LOVE this vacuum! I have hardwood floors and low carpeting in my house. I also have cats, and this vacuum picks up hair and litter like a beast. Just push a button to turn the brushes on and off when moving from carpet to bare floors. When turning the brushes on, though, hold on tight, because the vacuum will propel forward like you'd expect from a self-propelled lawn mower. It took me by surprise the first time I used it. It is pretty powerful. The vacuum maneuvers nicely and is lightweight. I'm super happy to get a vacuum with powerful suction at such a great price. It looks pretty cool, too.
customer_reviews.author: Trish

customer_reviews.title: Great value for money!
customer_reviews.text: Excellent suction for its size - it is definitely smaller and lighter than we expected but this in now way compromises the quality of the product. We have a mostly carpeted apartment with 4 cats and it does a great job on sucking up stray bits of cat litter and their fur. So far we are very pleased with and hope that it will stand the test of time (if not, we bought the extended warranty :)
customer_reviews.author: Lindi O.

customer_reviews.title: Great
customer_reviews.text: expected it to pick up all the hairs and dust, but it has no power at all! i dont know how ppl are reviewing this 5 stars, am i using it wrong? dissappointing. so heavy hairs stuck in the brish roll thing Edit, it works perfectly fine. I figured our that i need to turn on the brush role while cleaning the carpet. It even sucks all the human long hair from carpet amazing product live it worth it
customer_reviews.author: jolie

customer_reviews.title: Excellent vacuum cleaner!
customer_reviews.text: I have owned about 6 vacuum cleaners in my life and all of them are toys compared to this!! I wish someone would have told me to buy this vacuum cleaner years ago, it's AMAZING!! It was easy to assemble, all material is of superior quality, it has a long cord, and the best thing about it is the the brush tool for the carpet!! I have never had a cleaner that had this function and I love it! It brushes long carpet threads and gets the cleaner extra suction power. The carpet looks cleaner and refreshed. Highly recommended!!
customer_reviews.author: Raniamus

customer_reviews.title: This product has no suction!
customer_reviews.text: I have had a shark for many years and it’s my favorite vacuum ever! I bought this one for upstairs and have used it twice! It’s awful! There is no suction in the hose and does an awful job on my carpets. I am soooo disappointed and disgusted as it’s not a cheap vacuum! It seems like it’s possibly refurbished!
customer_reviews.author: Kylans mommy

customer_reviews.title: What's not to like?
customer_reviews.text: I'm very happy with this vacuum. Lightweight. Good suction. Easy to empty. The sponge filter is easy to clean and I do clean it after each use. The cord is nice and long. The hose is also long and convenient. I've been using this for months and am very satisfied. There is some assembly to do when it arrives, but nothing too challenging. It is both gross and satisfying to see the actual dirt that this vacuum is able to get out of the carpets. I think I'll be a Shark customer from now on.
customer_reviews.author: Ali

customer_reviews.title: I'm Impressed
customer_reviews.text: So far, I am quite impressed with the vacuum! I'll have to wait a while to determine longevity, but I'll say the 1st time I used the vacuum I was embarrassed by how much dirt and dust it captured! I'm one of the tidiest people I know, and since I've moved in I've been using a stick vac since I have no kids or pets to make a mess, and my carpets "looked clean". They weren't! This Shark vacuum feel like it is self propelled once you turn the brush roll on. It is extremely easy to maneuver, it is lightweight, so far seems powerful....especially for the price!
customer_reviews.author: Island Gal 767

customer_reviews.title: A vacuum that does as advertised!
customer_reviews.text: I just received the Shark Navigator vacuum. Putting it together was so easy. I got it up and running quite quickly. Then I gave it a try and it truly lived up to it's previous great reviews. It is a great little vacuum that is light weight, easy to handle and has fantastic suction. I had just vacuumed so I was ready to try my new vacuum out to see just how bad my old vacuum was doing. The result was pretty bad- almost as if I had not vacuumed at all. I have four Pomeranians and three cats so hair removal/control is a big priority for my household.
customer_reviews.author: MISTINE N SHAW

customer_reviews.title: watch out for security screws
customer_reviews.text: I originally bought this for my mother-in-law and it worked great up until right now. The brush stopped spinning so I thought maybe it just needs a new belt. Well, good luck if the version you bought has those stupid security screws all requiring a different size screwdriver head. I was able to get 6 of the little buggers out and drilled another one out but I still cannot get the bottom off this vacuum cleaner. I'm done and done buying Shark products! Someday, somebody in the vacuum cleaner business needs to figure out an easy way to change a belt out; today, that was definitely not the folks at Shark.
customer_reviews.author: Kendra Weindling

customer_reviews.title: Great buy for the $
customer_reviews.text: I thought this was the larger model with the swivel head, so that was my mistake. It does a great job though and is super light weight. It replaces my old Shark that was five years old I used in my cleaning business. I can tell you Sharks are worth every penny. I had a 400$ Electrolux that didn’t work as well as my “cheap” Shark upright.
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer Toussaint

customer_reviews.title: Great vacuum!
customer_reviews.text: Small, lightweight, powerful and amazing. So far, this thing hasn't met anything it didn't suck up (including a measuring tape I came a little too close to). Oops! If I had one complaint, it would be the capacity of the tank, but it's small for a reason. I believe it's the navigators smallest vacuum, so it's supposed to be small. It's great on pet hair though, you just have to empty it after every use if you're going to be doing multiple rooms. Small price to pay not to have to lug around a heavy vacuum everywhere. Even the kids use this easily!
customer_reviews.author: kpiscite

customer_reviews.title: Mostly good, but missing an attachment when I received
customer_reviews.text: This vacuum is a good little vacuum for what I need it for. I live in a 500 sq foot studio so I didn't need anything too crazy. It was kind of weird on the hardwood floors though, it kicked up a lot of dust which collected on top of the outside. I was also disappointed that it was missing an attachment when I received it. The missing piece holds the crevice piece onto the vacuum. So the crevice piece is just sitting in the closet until I need it. I had already used the vacuum before I realized and didn't want to deal with returning it.
customer_reviews.author: s girl

customer_reviews.title: It’s alright but...Get the deluxe
customer_reviews.text: As someone who views shark product as reliable/durable/powerful, I was slightly disappointed with the actual size of the vacuum/canister. The woman on the box must be real small for the cleaner to appear a decent size. 2-3 trips to the trash compared to my burnt out nv351. I am also missing an attachment that was supposed to come in box. I’m not returning it because I need it. Rated 4 just due to the fact that I was missing the extender nozzle tip that is used to hit the cracks and crevices.
customer_reviews.author: Eric Tubbs

customer_reviews.title: Beater bar to lift up carpet.
customer_reviews.text: This Shark Navigator is great, especially considering its low price. Good suction, great brushroll which can be turned on for carpet or off for bare floors. I like the easy to detach and empty bagless dust cup. Perfect for use in my 2 BR apartment which has carpet in the bedrooms and laminate flooring everywhere else. Light weight, easy to maneuver and small a footprint for storage. Best vacuum I've ever had.
customer_reviews.author: Kenneth J. Hinnenkamp

customer_reviews.title: It's a Vaccum!
customer_reviews.text: It's not the best I've ever used, or the worst. It's cheap, does a fairly good job at cleaning BOTH carpet and hardwood, and I've only had it get clogged once in several months of use. The suction is the same as when I bought it several months ago once I cleared the clog. I do have to say, it does better on carpet than hardood because of the carpet roller. That thing will suck EVERYTHING up.
customer_reviews.author: john

customer_reviews.title: light and easy to use
customer_reviews.text: Waited several months to write this review to be sure I would continue to be pleased with this product. I am 75 years old and have had much more expensive vacuums, but none that I liked more than this one. It is light and easy to use by someone who has back problems. Smaller head and container than most, but just zooms easily over areas and container is a snap to remove and empty. I no longer hate vacuuming.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: warrenty sucks
customer_reviews.text: Love these little sharks. good suction and nice and light to push around. This is a revised review. It broke less then a year, called. They do a interview on the phone as to what your problem is--- hummmmm- then tell you it will cost you almost $27 bucks for the shipping and handling for the part. WTF is that??? O and if that part dont solve your problem , maybe you will have to buy another part. What a joke they are. So be ware of the waranty practice-- total RIP OFF..... If u notice it takes a act to find it in the first place........
customer_reviews.author: betmax

customer_reviews.title: Doesn’t work properly
customer_reviews.text: This vacuum stopped working within a month of getting it. The suction was lost. On top of that ~ you have to clean and cut hairs out of the roller brush every few vacuums for it to actually work. It is honestly a pretty cheaply made vacuum. It isn’t even working now and I’ve used it maybe 5-6 times. Would not recommend.
customer_reviews.author: unknown

customer_reviews.title: Great Product with Great Value
customer_reviews.text: I chose this vacuum based on the reviews. I was scared that it may not be as effective as others wrote. However, I’m pleasantly surprised. The vacuum was easy to put together. It includes basic instructions. The vacuum sucks up all particles really well. It works on carpet and vinyl kitchen floors. I’ll definitely recommend this. It’s worth the money.
customer_reviews.author: Mrs. J.

customer_reviews.title: Sucks great
customer_reviews.text: VERY strong auction but too bulky to go under furniture. The flexible hose is too short and stiff. It pulls the vacuum over if I pull on it.
customer_reviews.author: MJ in VA

customer_reviews.title: Shark's power
customer_reviews.text: I bought this sight unseen so was surprised at how little it was. I was used to a more powerful and bigger vacuum so it took a little getting used to. After several uses I realized that it was a good fit for me. It is light and powerful and being smaller gets into spaces I couldn't do with my old machine. It is very easy to empty which I do after each use. I am very satisfied.
customer_reviews.author: Elaine Hedges

customer_reviews.title: Won’t Last. Died in Less Than a Year
customer_reviews.text: I bought this vacuum for my daughters bedroom, so it was not used very much or all that often. Lightly used maybe once a week of so. It died last night- 11 mos after buying it. That’s ridiculous for as little as it was used. I realize I didn’t pay very much for it, but I paid $40 for an Eureka Vacuum Cleaner for my sons apartment and 5 yrs later, it’s still going strong. Terrible purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Dawn Kardokus

customer_reviews.title: Really, really pleased with this!
customer_reviews.text: WE are really, really pleased with this! After years of multiple vacuums, I think we've finally found something that will work for us. This is super light, easy to navigate with, and picks up the mess well. Not needing bags is a major plus, and it's not so hard to clean out the bin. I have to admit, the instructions were too much for me; I usually do read the manual before using something, but on this I was too impatient. As a result...I am still a little lost on how to do things, and how to use all its features. When I have a chance, I definitely will spend some time on youtube or reading the actual manual.
customer_reviews.author: Ellen

customer_reviews.title: I had no idea I was living in such filth!
customer_reviews.text: My trusty old vacuum died on us last week, so I ordered this one. The amount of dust and filth that this unit picked up was ASTONISHING! We had empty the canister 3 times to clean our small 1 bedroom apartment! I thought my last vacuum cleaner was doing at least a decent job, but this sleek little thing has blown it completely out of the water.
customer_reviews.author: J. Baker

customer_reviews.title: A good buy
customer_reviews.text: This is a really good vacuum - and the price even beats Walmart for the same model (they would probably do a price match anyway, but why hassle when you can get it over Amazon for less than $100?). It's lightweight, all the attachments, well designed, and strong enough that it's almost self propelled by the brush. The head is smaller than standard vacs, meaning more sweeps to get the job done, but it also means you can get in spaces the larger ones couldn't.
customer_reviews.author: Dave A.Top Contributor: Watches

customer_reviews.title: Great suction very lightweight
customer_reviews.text: I have you start products for years and I am in love with this vacuum. It is the cheapest model I have bought of any shark product and it's by far my favorite so far. Lightweight easy to clean and I feel like the suction on this model is way more than any other ones have had.
customer_reviews.author: Tim Yerkey

customer_reviews.title: Will always buy a Shark from now on
customer_reviews.text: There is absolutely nothing negative to say about a Shark. Is made for the female user. Everything works perfect. I have a Terrier mix which sheds 24 hours a day, 7 days a week. This unit takes care of it without any difficulties. It is lighter weight, the dust cup is easy to empty. Also after liking this one so much bought the Shark cordless sweeper. Just as pleased with it.
customer_reviews.author: Ingrid

customer_reviews.title: A very good deal!
customer_reviews.text: I could sell Shark Vacuum cleaners for a living. It’s about the only product that pays for itself. I love this little vacuum, it does the job of a big one and it’s not as heavy. I’d choose it over an Oreck any day. I have a two story home I have one on both floors.
customer_reviews.author: Janet Goodman

customer_reviews.title: My new shark vacuum
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful blue color light weight easy to assemble even without reading directions a fifth grader could put it together great for vacuuming the stairs under the beds hard to reach places curtains mini blinds hardwood floors carpet tile great price Great for senior citizens inexpensive but good quality long cord beautiful design
customer_reviews.author: Sharon Hughes

customer_reviews.title: Light weight and cleans well!
customer_reviews.text: One of the things I like most about this, is that it is light weight and does a great job! We have a dog and it does a good job with the dog hair. The filters are easy to clean as well. Very good little vacuum. Would definitely recommend giving this vacuum a try!
customer_reviews.author: Mary M

customer_reviews.title: Was missing an attachment
customer_reviews.text: I bought this new instead of used because I figured there was less chance of ending up with a poor product. Overall this vacuum works fine, but an attachment that is needed to allow the other attachments to actually ATTACH to the hose was missing. This was a new, unopened product. A bit disappointed but it isn't really worth the time getting the run around for a piece of plastic. I'll just use the hose without the attachments for furniture or tight spaces.
customer_reviews.author: R Hill

customer_reviews.title: Surprisingly awesome!
customer_reviews.text: We first vacuumed with our good Miele vacuum just to experiment. Then we went over the same room carpet and OMGOODNESS! The entire canister was filled! This vacuum is amazing!!! What we do is empty the canister after every use. Then we take the canister and air compressor all the parts which is not necessary but we do so there is no smell!
customer_reviews.author: Chrissy

customer_reviews.title: Brand loyalty change!
customer_reviews.text: Being loyal to another vacuum brand for years, I was hesitant to try a Shark. Wow, so glad I took a chance! With three indoor dogs, this little vacuum picks up more than I could imagine! My carpet actually looks vacuumed. Bonus is that it leaves those freshly vacuumed carpet lines that I haven't seen in years with my previous brand of vacuum. Great value for what I spent, would buy it again & again.
customer_reviews.author: Hope G

customer_reviews.title: Kirby vs Shark
customer_reviews.text: I am 80 years old and having been raised with Kirby vacuum cleaners all my life, it was a huge decision to make a change. I couldn't push the Kirby anymore.I heard good reviews on the Shark, so thought I would give it a try. What a surprise. It is easy to use and does a great cleaning job. I have a very hairy dog and lots of hair on the carpet.It did a terrific job.It was so easy to empty the canister. I am just sorry I waited so long to change to a Shark. Do you know anyone who would like to buy a Kirby with all the attachments? It even has a shampoo attachment.
customer_reviews.author: CAROLYN LATTA

customer_reviews.title: Stopped working after a few months of very light usage.
customer_reviews.text: First and last Shark vaccum cleaner. It worked well the first month, then it started to fall apart. My floors are wooden, I live in a 1000 square foot apartment with a black lab mix dog. Well, the lab hair won and the shark lost in the middle of month 2. It has terrible air circulation and you’re always having to clean it out. Lots of parts you have to disassemble to clean it, not worth the money or time. I’ve tried to get the sucction power to improve but to no avail. A very poor value that is best avoided.
customer_reviews.author: Emery Thompson

customer_reviews.title: Excellent little sweeper
customer_reviews.text: Great suction on this little sweeper. Canister is small and does fill quickly. The short hand wand attachment is long enough to clean upholstery, but not long enough for nine foot ceilings. Very strong suction did a great job on both low pile carpet and laminate or hardwood floors.
customer_reviews.author: Granny B

customer_reviews.title: Broken belt within first week of use.
customer_reviews.text: I bought this vacuum cleaner for my mother and father as a housewarming gift since they had just purchased a new home. At first, they loved it. But less than a week of using it, it started spitting out what was being swept up from the back end and come to find out...
customer_reviews.author: Amber

customer_reviews.title: SHARK HAS THE BEST SUCTION
customer_reviews.text: I am sold on SHARK VACUUM , I ONLY BUY SHARK. THEY DON'T EVER LET ME DOWN. THIS ONE IS SO LIFE I AT 72 CAN USE IT EASILY. LOVE LOVE LOVE THIS VACUUM
customer_reviews.author: gabby

customer_reviews.title: Terribly Hard to Push
customer_reviews.text: I loved my first Shark but not this one. It is almost impossible to push on carpet and most of the time have to use two hands to push it. I have only used it twice and even had a young lady try it and she had trouble pushing it also. Since It was after the return time I couldn't return and talked to the Shark people to no avail, as there was nothing obviously wrong except terrible to push unless you want to build up muscles
customer_reviews.author: L Clarke

customer_reviews.title: Terrible
customer_reviews.text: The belt broke after minimal usage. Incredibly disappointed. We live in a 1000 Sq ft apartment with no pets, moderately clean, small family. No reason at all to have broken that easily and completely.
customer_reviews.author: Raquel

customer_reviews.title: Heavy With Good Suction
customer_reviews.text: I just took it out of the box and although it was heavy to unpack it was easy to put together. It's much heavier to use than my old lightweight Rocket and almost drags on the carpet. I do like the cord length and think it's doing a good job cleaning. I'm hoping to get used to it and update this review as I use it more. But for now, I don't think it's the best apartment rug because of it's size, drag and weight.
customer_reviews.author: Jeanette M. Olson

customer_reviews.title: Good product  needs some design changes to be 100%
customer_reviews.text: good vacuum good suction however hose too short to use accessories vacuum keeps falling over
customer_reviews.author: Bob M

customer_reviews.title: It is the BEST vacuum I've ever used!
customer_reviews.text: I was looking for something that was easy to lift and push around. I ran my normal vacuum and the next day, when the Shark arrived, I used it just in the living room. The pet hair and dirt that it picked up, was like I hadn't vacuumed in a month. It was disgusting and rewarding at the same time. You will NOT be disappointed!
customer_reviews.author: donnafromdenver

customer_reviews.title: Great little vacuum that could !
customer_reviews.text: I love this little vacuum better than my big Dyson. I purchased this for my upstairs so I didn’t have to carry the Dyson up and down. It’s lightweight but powerful.
customer_reviews.author: Rita

customer_reviews.title: works well
customer_reviews.text: I like shark vacuums and have had others in the past. Clearly Shark vacuums come in a variety of options and pricing however this little guy works well, light weight and easy to clean the trap/container. The cord is shorter (25ft) but manageable and the dirt/hair container does get filled up quickly. Not surprising since I have a long haired dog. Anyway, it does get low and into small areas. I would recommend this for anyone looking for lightweight and easy maneuverability.
customer_reviews.author: Karolyn Schillinger

customer_reviews.title: Shedding golden...it works!
customer_reviews.text: Best vacuum I have ever had. I have a golden retriever that sheds A LOT and this vacuum handles his shedding. We have mostly hardwood with an exception of 1 area rug but I would definitely recommend this vacuum
customer_reviews.author: Lori G

customer_reviews.title: Wow!
customer_reviews.text: The Shark Navigator is great! Lightweight, well priced, and really sucks up dirt, dog hair, and cat litter. My wife likes that the vacuum is light enough to use on stairs. On this model, you can turn off the rotating brush, which is important when vacuuming on hard-surface floors. Other vacuums shoot debris across the floor when the rotating brush continues to spin.
customer_reviews.author: Dr. Rod

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy Inexpensive Vacuum
customer_reviews.text: Easy to assemble, great for smaller areas like cat boxes or feeding areas. Picks up small litter just fine. Beware though of missing attachment parts. The general all purpose brush attachment was missing. Sharp sent the missing piece after calling them. I got the feeling based on the conversation with Sharp that this attachment was left out of many units.
customer_reviews.author: Clara

customer_reviews.title: Actually, zero stars!
customer_reviews.text: We have a brand new area rug that has kind of a chenille feel to it, and bought this vacuum to help keep it clean. Mistake! The vacuum brush just grabbed onto the fibers of the rug and refused to let go the very first time we took it from the shipping box and tried it. It was bizarre! We just said goodbye to our old Shark Lift Away and it was a great vacuum for 9 years! So we jumped at the opportunity to get the smaller Shark Navigator since all we have now is two small area rugs. I'm so disappointed. It's completely useless to us. What a waste of money. Sending it back tomorrow!
customer_reviews.author: CALIGIRL78

customer_reviews.title: Perfect
customer_reviews.text: I had been using a Kirby for years. My carpets looked dirty still even with a new bag. Not to mention HEAVY! I am elderly and decided I needed something that would not make my back hurt. I bought Shark and I love it. Surprised at all the dirt and dog hair that came out of this carpet. I just emty the canister and continue. I love this machine.
customer_reviews.author: Linda

customer_reviews.title: Very satisfied
customer_reviews.text: Replaced my old vacuum that was almost like this model. The only difference I can see is the dust cup is now smaller. Lots of suction. I love how lightweight it is! Great for someone with a bad back.
customer_reviews.author: yvi

customer_reviews.title: Best vacuum!
customer_reviews.text: I love my new Shark vacuum! I have a bad back and this vacuum is so nice and light and it also does a great job. It works just as well as my Dyson animal (which I can't use anymore).
customer_reviews.author: Gabriele M. Karlkvist

customer_reviews.title: Lasted 8 months
customer_reviews.text: I bought this sweeper in July 2018 mainly because of the Shark brand name and the price. I thought it would be a good little vacuum and I've owned other Shark vacuums. It was a more quiet sweeper than others I've owned and worked well. As I was vacuuming a couple of days ago, it sputtered then died. I am really disappointed so I decided to get another brand. Hopefully it will last longer than 8 months.
customer_reviews.author: Teresa Riggs

customer_reviews.title: Missing parts
customer_reviews.text: The vacuum is wonderful and works great. This is the second vacuum I’ve bought. I bought this one for my sister because she loves mine so much However, I am only giving it 2 stars becuase I only received 1 out of the 3 attachment parts. When I contacted Amazon, they were not able to help me in getting the missing attachment parts. While Amazon’s costumer service is nice, they claimed I would have to buy the missing parts from Shark’s website. Ridiculous!
customer_reviews.author: Kathryn S

customer_reviews.title: Nice, lightweight vacuum
customer_reviews.text: We have wood floors in our home and have been using an Oreck for years. It works great, but is expensive. We bought a small office building and put in vinyl flooring and bought this to keep there. It works great, and is super lightweight and easy to maneuver. You can turn the spinning head off for wood floors and it picks up bits of paper and all the little things you'd expect in an office setting with ease. Kick on the spinning head and it works great on the rugs. Great purchase for us.
customer_reviews.author: Brian Osborn

customer_reviews.title: So so
customer_reviews.text: This states that hair will not get tangled in the rollers but it does very much so, it also cannot vacuum shag type of carpets only low carpets and floor. I am not happy with this and will need to buy another soon
customer_reviews.author: Paula Semakula

customer_reviews.title: Very pleased!
customer_reviews.text: This is my new favorite vacuum!!! So lightweight.... I love how easy it is to release the wand to suck up pesky bugs or dirt. Cord is a good length, easy to empty the canister, too! I'm very pleased!
customer_reviews.author: Julia

customer_reviews.title: Seems to be a very nice vacuum. It is quiet and powerful and works ...
customer_reviews.text: Seems to be a very nice vacuum. It is quiet and powerful and works well in my home. I hope it has longevity...
customer_reviews.author: Hillcrest

customer_reviews.title: Good lightweight vacuum
customer_reviews.text: The lady who cleans my house adores this vacuum because it is lightweight but has great suction power. However, these vacs do break down after a while. This is my third Shark vacuum of this or a similar type. Luckily they are fairly inexpensive and I’ve always been happy to get a new one.
customer_reviews.author: Lee

customer_reviews.title: Great little vacuum.
customer_reviews.text: Bought to use at our cabin. I have a dog that sheds and this vacuum has more than satisfied me with its cleaning power. Not a huge vacuum which is what I wanted. Perfect size for anyone with back issues.
customer_reviews.author: Jan Elfrink

customer_reviews.title: Good lightweight vacuum
customer_reviews.text: I have this vacuum for 6 months and it serves my needs well. I have an area rugs and a few other smaller rugs in the house. The rest if the house is hard wood. The suction is very good it's very strong so this vacuum may not work well on a shag carpet. I could see where the vacuum suction could cause issues. It's great on low pile rugs and hardwood.
customer_reviews.author: Nancy

customer_reviews.title: This is the second one that I have bought.
customer_reviews.text: I live in an apartment and this thing has been doing the trick for a while. Small enough to around and under. Good suction. I bought a second one for moms. I have a brand new vacuum robot just sitting in the box because of the Shark.
customer_reviews.author: L.C.

customer_reviews.title: Great vacuum
customer_reviews.text: I tried this vacuum today for the first time. I love it! It worked great on my tan carpet( I have a black cat). I had been shopping around and reading reviews on shark vacuums. A friend bought one and loves her too!
customer_reviews.author: Margaret P. Heise

customer_reviews.title: Recommend!
customer_reviews.text: I love this vacuum! I decided to be an adult and not but for the cheap vacuum. So happy with my decision! We have 2 dogs (one of them has an unearthly amount of hair that he sheds) and this product does a great job at picking up all the dog hair on both hardwood and carpet. It’s lightweight, the container is easy to empty, and it’s not as loud as my last vacuum. All around win. Only complaint it the hose is a little short and doesn’t extend very long.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great vacuum
customer_reviews.text: I love this vacuum it’s so light weight I can use it and it vacuums beautifully I have a thick wool carpet and tile floors and it goes up and down on the carpets really well it’s the best purchase I’ve made in a long time. I would have liked to have a long thin attachment To get into hard to reach places.
customer_reviews.author: Star Lanier

customer_reviews.title: Inexpensive but DIED less than 5 months with only weekly use
customer_reviews.text: Very sad to report that this vacuum has died after less than 5 months of weekly use. I know it wasn't the most expensive Shark but I expected it to last more than 5 months. If seller replaces or repairs I will update and change my rating...
customer_reviews.author: Countrylife

customer_reviews.title: Mighty but small
customer_reviews.text: Love this vacuum Item arrived with wrong accessory, called company another item sent but still incorrect. As far as vacuum itself- it’s great, light weight , great suction
customer_reviews.author: Speedstepper

customer_reviews.title: Great little vacuum for quick cleanups
customer_reviews.text: This is a great vacuum for the price and definitely has a powerful motor for its size ! If you’re looking for a small vacuum for fast clean up, this would be a great choice . My only reason for four stars is that the hose is not as long as the photos, which is what I was looking for in a vacuum.
customer_reviews.author: Bonny50+

customer_reviews.title: Only lasted a few months with LIGHT use!
customer_reviews.text: Purchased in April because of the good reviews, but it broke by July. I was only using it... maybe weekly? We have mostly hardwoods so I thought this would be perfect for the little carpet we have in our house. Wrong!! Wish I invested a little more into a better model, or different brand.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Love It!
customer_reviews.text: Great vacuum, lightweight, durable, good suction. I have two kitties work great for pet hair and any litter that escapes the box. I have purchased different models in the past, this is just as great as the heavier bigger models. If you like shark vacuums this is a great deal!
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer Pilates

customer_reviews.title: Two Houses Two Sharks
customer_reviews.text: I bought a shark a few years ago for my winter home. Recently bought this for my summer home. The features have been updated, what a wonderful machine! I love how it runs smoothly from hardwood to carpet with a push of a button. My husband was amazed at how it picked up off the carpet!
customer_reviews.author: Ray White

customer_reviews.title: Highly recommend for small apt
customer_reviews.text: Good suction, small canister and has to be emptied frequently.
customer_reviews.author: TC Queens NY

customer_reviews.title: Great everyday powerfull lightweight vac!
customer_reviews.text: Ill keep this short, Compaired to our dyson and electrolux bagless canister vac, this one is so much easier to use. Has alot of suction and feels like its on ball bearings with brushroll on for carpet. Does a fine job on bare floor also, brushroll on or off. This doesnt feel flimsy and empties much easier then a dyson. It does not lift off so vacuuming under beds is not possible. There is no light or swivel head, but that doesnt bother me much. We just wanted an everyday lightweight vac we can throw around, it has met every goal! For the 89 bucks it cost me, i feel its much better then the 300plus canister vacs we've had!
customer_reviews.author: Chris

customer_reviews.title: Durability
customer_reviews.text: The suction was amazing at first then 6 months later the vacuum started spitting out the dirt out of the filter. I called customer support and they sent another filter, but dirt continued to spit out. I had to take apart vacuum to clean the dirt out of all the tubes because it never made it into the filter container.
customer_reviews.author: Gigi

customer_reviews.title: Don't buy it
customer_reviews.text: Heavy vaccum. Motor stopped working after less than 5 months. Don't waste your money. Unhappy customer.
customer_reviews.author: IVY MAZZELLA

customer_reviews.title: I LOVE this vacuum.
customer_reviews.text: I am very hard on my vacuums because I absolutely love to clean 24/7. Through the years I have owned several Dyson's and other name brands, but nothing has ever done such an amazing job as this vacuum has done. It is small, but very effective at getting the job done. Oh, and the suction this thing has is AMAZING!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Goid price, so far so good
customer_reviews.text: Very light and seens to clean well, good suction for the weight, wife really likes the attachments, remains to be seen how durable as this will be used in a beach cottage over the summer.
customer_reviews.author: Big Blue Fan

customer_reviews.title: Super suction.
customer_reviews.text: Have oriental style 12 x 9 area rug. This little unit wants to pick up the rug. Outperforms our Shark Rocket which is a very good unit. Small enough to get most anywhere and easily maneuverable. Have not had long enough to speak of durability but unit seems solid. Only thing is unit shipped with wrong brush attachment, called Shark and they will send correct one but said it could take up to 10 weeks to get. Nothing after a month plus.
customer_reviews.author: Al K

customer_reviews.title: The best vacuum!
customer_reviews.text: When I needed a new vacuum I first asked my Facebook friends which one they would recommend. They Overwhelmingly, chose this one! This small but powerful vacuum did not disappoint!! It checks absolutely all my boxes...easy, lightweight, effective and quiet.
customer_reviews.author: G. Meling

customer_reviews.title: Great vacuum
customer_reviews.text: What a great tool, its the smaller one of the sharks but it works great. If you are looking for a whole house vacuum this one may be too small for you. However it will get the job done.
customer_reviews.author: Robert Russell

customer_reviews.title: and I loved it. I have two cats and an Australian ...
customer_reviews.text: My step mom has one of these, and I loved it. I have two cats and an Australian Shepherd. All three shed a lot, and this has no problem sucking them up. It takes a few passes because the canister is a little small, but I could not be happier with this!
customer_reviews.author: Kim

customer_reviews.title: The best vacuum I have ever bought!!!!!
customer_reviews.text: Just received my new vacuum and I must say I LOVE IT!!! I vacuumed the room with my old one just yesterday and today with this one and it looked like I hadn’t vacuumed in months it picked up so much dust. Very happy :)
customer_reviews.author: Michelle A

customer_reviews.title: This vacuum was easy to put together
customer_reviews.text: This vacuum was easy to put together, but it is really hard to push on my carpet which is not a high or heavy pile. It has really nice suction on the hard wood floors. I don't know how to adjust the head height?
customer_reviews.author: Betty

customer_reviews.title: Great lightweight vacuum.
customer_reviews.text: This vacuum replaced a Hoover Wind tunnel that was so heavy to push that my back hurt. I absolutely love this Shark. It's so light weight it practically propels itself across the carpet. I have two cats and this vacuum does a great job on cat hair. Plus it's easy to go from carpet to bare floor with a push of a button. No complaints!
customer_reviews.author: Laura M

customer_reviews.title: Great Value Vaccum
customer_reviews.text: Love this vacuum! It really gets the job done. I don’t have pets but I do she’d quite a bit myself and this gets all the hair up and then some. Only issue I have with it is that the crevice attachment does not fit onto the provided holder. I tried many times to figure out how it would but it does not! Beyond that one odd thing, this vacuum is a great value.
customer_reviews.author: Savannah

customer_reviews.title: Died in less than a week
customer_reviews.text: I've had this vacuum less than a week and it already died. It worked great the few times I used it
customer_reviews.author: Hu

product_meta.title: Shark Upright & Canister Upright Vacuum, One Size, Blue
product_meta.description:
Shark Navigator Light Upright Vacuum, Blue (NV105)

BRAND STORY
By Shark
feature_bullets: Lightweight and maneuverable at only 10.6 pounds
Superior carpet & Bare Floor Cleaning with brush roll shutoff;Recommended Surface:Multi Surface
Large capacity bagless dust cup; The power cord is 25 feet long.To adjust the amount of suction power, slide the suction control button at the end of the flexible hose
Zero maintenance costs. The dust cup holds 0.8 dry quarts (to the fill line) and 1.8 dry quarts (real usable capacity). It has an easy, bottom-empty design for quick removal of debris

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.3 out of 5 stars1,260 ratings4.3 out of 5 stars
